about_the_game:
"Pirarucu's Money Rush" is a running game featuring Pirarucu, a shopping-loving lady from "Goonya Monster."

Pirarucu runs, leaps over cliffs, stomps on enemies, all amidst a rain of fireballs, just for the sake of shopping!
Collect the coins scattered along the way and enjoy shopping at the checkpoints!

Big Coins, Small Coins
There are both big and small coins scattered throughout the stages. Aim to grab the big coins as they offer bonus points!
Plan Your Shopping!
Bold shopping sprees might lead to running out of funds quickly. Plan your shopping strategically to ensure you can buy the necessary items!
Beware of Dangers Along the Way...
Small undead creatures and fireballs flow through the stages. Colliding with them will cause damage. Defeat the undead by stomping on them and gracefully dodge the fireballs by jumping!
Keep Running Towards the Next Shopping Trip
Shopping is a race against time. Pirarucu's running speed increases steadily, so aim for the checkpoints while battling the thrill of the chase!

movies.name: ピラルクのマネーラッシュ_予告動画

name: Pirarucu's Money Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! "Pirarucu's Money Rush" is a side-scrolling shopping rampage game! At each stage checkpoint, which changes with every play, you can purchase items to gain an advantage in the game.
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
